search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Chatfuel (chatfuel.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Chatfuel is: [https://chatfuel.com/pricing](https://chatfuel.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

Enterprise from $300 A tailored plan, priority support, and a dedicated bot builder specialist [Book consultation](https://chatfuel.com/premium/request-demo) Everything in business, plus: Personal account manager Bot building services (10 free hours) Bulk pricing Features available on all plans Create with intuitive Flow builder Build automated conversation scenarios with ease. Let your chatbot answer FAQs, generate leads, share discounts and more. ![Image 16: magic pic](https://chatfuel.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F0.c1071196.png&w=1900&q=100) Access free, ready-made templates Not sure where to start? Choose from our 30+ templates that cover the most popular chatbot use cases. Create your first bot in a flash. ![Image 17: magic pic](https://chatfuel.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F1.173ed998.png&w=1900&q=100) Automate communication channels Bring customers to your chatbot from direct chat messages or Ads that click to WhatsApp. ![Image 18: magic pic](https://chatfuel.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F2.542a7118.png&w=1900&q=100) Manage new leads all in one place Easily segment, qualify, and export all the leads your chatbot captures with Chatfuel’s built-in CRM feature. ![Image 19: magic pic](https://chatfuel.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F3.d7dd84cd.png&w=1900&q=100) Get support when you need it Support is available via live chat and email. To help you make the most of Chatfuel, we've prepared detailed documentation and great video tutorials. ![Image 20: magic pic](https://chatfuel.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F4.0946e292.png&w=1900&q=100) Expand using integrations Our platform provides integrations with all kinds of useful tools like Google Sheets, Calendly, and Zapier. We also offer an API for custom integrations. ![Image 21: magic pic](https://chatfuel.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F5.8b67fa8e.png&w=1900&q=100) ![Image 22: image 1](https://chatfuel.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F0.c1071196.png&w=1900&q=100) ![Image 23: image 2](https://chatfuel.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F1.173ed998.png&w=1900&q=100) ![Image 24: image 3](https://chatfuel.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F2.542a7118.png&w=1900&q=100) ![Image 25: image 4](https://chatfuel.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F3.d7dd84cd.png&w=1900&q=100) ![Image 26: image 5](https://chatfuel.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F4.0946e292.png&w=1900&q=100) ![Image 27: image 6](https://chatfuel.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2F5.8b67fa8e.png&w=1900&q=100) Bot building on demand We can create a custom chatbot for your specific use case. Use the table below for rough estimates, the final price will depend on the size and scale of your chatbot. Use cases Lead generationfrom $200 Lead qualificationfrom $200 Customer supportfrom $150 Answering FAQsfrom $150 Gathering feedbackfrom $100 Re-engagementfrom $100 Salesfrom $500 Payment processingfrom $200 Appointment schedulingfrom $150 Integrations Google Sheetsfrom $100 Hubspotfrom $100 Shopifyfrom $150 Zapierfrom $100 CRMfrom $100 APIfrom $100 Custom integrationfrom $100 [Leave a request](https://chatfuel.com/features/bot-building) FAQs How do you count conversations? A conversation is one written exchange between a user and a bot, or a user and a Live Chat admin. We will close a conversation if after 24 hours a user or a bot does not receive a message. If a user writes to bot again after 24 hours, a new conversation will start. See all information about conversations in use under the Billing tab. What is your refund policy? If you are unhappy with Chatfuel for any reason, we provide a 30-day refund for all our paid plans. Find more details in our Terms of Use. Where do I find my invoices? You can find your monthly invoices under the Billing tab in your dashboard. Click on Payments, you'll see the receipt icon next to the amount for each month. When do I get billed? A paid plan provides you with a number of conversations. You pay for your plan monthly on the day you activated your subscription. If you go over your plan's limit we will charge an adjustment fee. This is done at the end of each month. The fee is based on how many new conversations your bot had over your limit. Find out more in the Billing tab. What forms of payment do you accept? We accept all major credit cards including Visa, MasterCard, Discover, and American Express. Can I cancel a paid plan? Yes, you can cancel your paid plan any time. The only exception being customers who we agreed on custom Chatfuel pricing with individual terms.
